attributes.action: amend the application of immigration rules as stated below.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are connected with a UK based international charitable organisation which wishes to appoint as its leader a person from the Ivory Coast.  If he comes to this country in this capacity, he will clearly need to bring his family. We understand that the nearest UK High Commission has refused his request.
His case is still subject to appeal so we do not want to give any more details as the issue on which we wish to petition is the general point rather than his particular circumstances.
We consider that it is detrimental to the interests of this country that international organisations should be forced to move elsewhere because the immigration rules are this tight; and so we believe the rules should be changed as soon as possible to allow bona fide people like this one to come to this country to work and to come with their immediate families.

rejection.details: Individual immigration cases are a matter for direct communication with the UK Border Agency.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
